thread.title: Rihanna And Azealia Banks Feud Over Trump’s Muslim Ban
thread.title_full: Rihanna And Azealia Banks Feud Over Trump’s Muslim Ban

author: Peter Helman
title: Rihanna And Azealia Banks Feud Over Trump’s Muslim Ban
text:
CREDIT: Patrick Kovarik/Cassandra Hannagan/Getty 
Rihanna participated in the Women’s March in New York last weekend, and yesterday, she took to Twitter to condemn Donald Trump’s executive order to ban citizens from seven predominantly Muslim countries from entering the United States: Disgusted! The news is devastating! America is being ruined right before our eyes! What an immoral pig you have to be to implement such BS!! 
— Rihanna (@rihanna) January 29, 2017 
Of course, expert political analyst and Trump supporter Azealia Banks just had to chime in with her own, deeply misguided thoughts about the Muslim ban. And because she’s still banned from Twitter , she wrote a series of Instagram posts defending the order and telling Rihanna to “shut up and sit down.” A photo posted by Azealia Banks (@azealiabanks) on Jan 29, 2017 at 8:44am PST A photo posted by Azealia Banks (@azealiabanks) on Jan 29, 2017 at 8:57am PST A photo posted by Azealia Banks (@azealiabanks) on Jan 29, 2017 at 9:14am PST 
Rihanna chose to respond with a little subtweet: A photo posted by badgalriri (@badgalriri) on Jan 29, 2017 at 9:18am PST 
Banks, never one for subtlety, chose to respond with a bunch of disgusting, hateful garbage: A photo posted by Azealia Banks (@azealiabanks) on Jan 29, 2017 at 9:22am PST 
And things pretty much just went on from there. A photo posted by Azealia Banks (@azealiabanks) on Jan 29, 2017 at 9:44am PST A photo posted by badgalriri (@badgalriri) on Jan 29, 2017 at 10:36am PST A photo posted by Azealia Banks (@azealiabanks) on Jan 29, 2017 at 10:44am PST Jan 29, 2017 at 10:47am PST  A video posted by Azealia Banks (@azealiabanks) on Jan 29, 2017 at 10:50am PST Jan 29, 2017 at 12:23pm PST 
I think it might be time for another much-needed Rihanna break .
